forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early, then clouds lingering for the afternoon. High 13C. SSW winds shifting to NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early with some clearing for the afternoon. High 56F. SSW winds shifting to NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 7C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low around 45F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 19C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High near 65F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 7C. N winds at 15 to 25 km/h, decreasing to 5 to 10 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 44F. N winds at 10 to 15 mph, decreasing to less than 5 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 22C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High around 70F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 24C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 74F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear skies. Low 52F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 21C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High around 70F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High around 20C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 67F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 19C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High around 65F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 17C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 62F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low around 10C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 49F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 18C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 49F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.
